divs: Sighting DetailsTo the individuals that came by my home the other night, thank you for allowing me to know. I am writing this to make a request that one or some of you help in gulf coast effort in any way that you can. thanks for changing my life and line of thought. I hope for you and your kind longevity and good life and the ability to find what you seek. Thanks again. I also request that you not allow my grandchildren to see you again if that's possible.
Summary: Know that you are monitoring this site.
